attributes.action: Reconsider relationship with Saudi Arabia for executing Shia leader Sheikh Nimr
attributes.additional_details:
The action of Saudi kingdom is totally anti human and will ignite new levels of sectarian war in the fragile Middle East region and among Muslims world wide.
We the British people ask the government to reconsider its relationship with the kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
attributes.background: Saudi Arabia executed a prominent cleric and Shia religious leader sheikh Nimr days ago, claiming that he was a terrorist, while he had only called for peaceful protest against racism and urged government for reforms.
